name: Mobile Bridge
overview:
Mobile Bridge is a mobile app engagement solution.

With its simple drag and drop library, app developers can “drop” Mobile Bridge into their app, have access to the cloud scalable back end (MbaaS) and have it ready to run in 90 minutes or less.

App developers get access to geo-targeted push notifications, time and location based push-notifications, cms controlled push notifications, as well as fun and exciting games such as the “scratch and win” and “slot machine” to reveal personal and exclusive discounts.

With retargeting and segmentation, clients can select and categorize customers and provide them with highly desired incentives and offers.

With QR code and NFC labels, traditional marketing can be mobile enabled, and allow users automatically redirect to the target app download page (and reveal the specific offer when the app opens) and enjoy all the benefits that a personalized app can offer.

With integrated analytics, users can visualize which QR codes are getting scanned most, where redemptions are occurring, and which campaigns are enjoying the most success.
